Insert new code chunk (R, bash, python, etc. available)
This is an example of R code.
include=FALSE will disregard this code chunk in knit
```{r setup, include=FALSE}
# This is R code
summary(mtcars)

# Other parameters for output control
#{r chunk_name, ...}
#Global parameters
#```{r setup, include=FALSE}
#knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
#```
```
Can use R chunk for figures
```{r}
data("mtcars")
library(ggplot2)
ggplot(mtcars, aes(x = wt, y = mpg)) +
  geom_point() 
  
```

## R Markdown formatting options

# First level header

example text

## Second level header
#### style and emphasis
### Third level header

*This text is italicized* 

**This text is bolded**

- one list item
- two list items
  - one subitem

1. ordered list item
2. another ordered list item
  - one subitem

## Formatted Tables
```{r}
library(knitr)
kable(mtcars, digits = 3, format = "markdown")
```
